solution_line_template: A train with {num_train_cars} cars can carry {num_train_cars} x {passengers_per_train_car} = <<{num_train_cars}*{passengers_per_train_car}={total_train_passengers}>>{total_train_passengers} passengers

The train can carry {total_train_passengers} - {total_airplane_passengers} = <<{total_train_passengers}-{total_airplane_passengers}={difference_in_passengers}>>{difference_in_passengers} passengers more than {num_airplanes} airplanes.
